about_the_game:
Yooka-Laylee’s mouth-watering (ear-leaking?) soundtrack combines three of gaming’s greatest composers, the legendary David Wise (Donkey Kong Country, Diddy Kong Racing), equally esteemed Banjo-Kazooie composer Grant Kirkhope (Viva Piñata, GoldenEye 007) and the award-winning Steve Burke (Kameo: Elements of Power).

This is one musical performance you definitely don’t want to miss!

Track list:


1 Main Theme
2 Shipwreck Creek
3 Hivory Towers
4 World 1 Theme
5 World 2 Theme
6 World 3 Theme
7 World 4 Theme
8 World 5 Theme
9 Uphill Battle
10 Frosty Fray
11 Armed and Dangerous
12 Track Attack
13 Skiffy Skirmish
14 Final Beeting
15 Kartos Karting
16 Bee Bop
17 Hurdle Hijinx
18 Up 'N' Nova
19 Jobstacle Course
20 Glaciators
21 Blag the Flag
22 Gun-tlet Run
23 Minecart Theme (World 1)
24 Minecart Theme (World 2)
25 Minecart Theme (World 3)
26 Minecart Theme (World 4)
27 Minecart Theme (World 5)
28 Tropic Trials
29 World 1 Varient #1
30 World 1 Varient #2
31 World 2 Varient #1
32 World 2 Varient #2
33 World 3 Varient #1
34 World 3 Varient #2
35 World 4 Varient #1
36 World 4 Varient #2
37 World 5 Varient #1
38 World 5 Varient #2

These tracks will be found in your Steam folder in - steamapps/common/YookaLaylee/Yooka-Laylee Soundtrack

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or later or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 3.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTS450 / AMD Radeon 6850HD
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 @ 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 640M or equivalent
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

name: Yooka-Laylee Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500 3.3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTS450 / AMD Radeon 6850HD
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Card

short_description: Yooka-Laylee’s mouth-watering soundtrack combines three of gaming’s greatest composers, the legendary David Wise (Donkey Kong Country, Diddy Kong Racing), equally esteemed Banjo-Kazooie composer Grant Kirkhope (Viva Piñata, GoldenEye 007) and the award-winning Steve Burke (Kameo).
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
